app.title: PPhoto
app.subtitle: Photo Printing Layout Tool
app.slogan: Smart · Efficient · Zero Waste —— Redefining your photo printing experience!
app.description: PPhoto is a simple and efficient photo printing layout tool that helps you quickly organize photos, create smart layouts, and print in multiple formats. No login required, completely free, can be used online or deployed locally.

multipleFormats.title: Multiple Photo Formats
multipleFormats.description: Supports layouts for 1-inch, 2-inch, 5-inch, 6-inch, A4 and more

paperSizes.title: Variety of Paper Sizes
paperSizes.description: Supports 6-inch, A4, A5 and other common paper sizes with smart arrangement

pdfExport.title: Instant PDF Export
pdfExport.description: One-click export of high-quality PDF files, ready for printing

easyToUse.title: Minimal Learning Curve
easyToUse.description: Drag, preview, and adjust seamlessly with zero learning cost

footer.copyright: © 2025 PPhoto | Independent Developer Open Source Project | GitHub | Contact
